author: The Irish Times
title: Covid-19 prompts first contraction in China’s GDP in decades
description: China’s GDP showed the first contraction in decades as the coronavirus outbreak shut down large parts of its economy. The country also revised its death toll by 39 per cent, adding 1,290 fatalities in Wuhan, where the epidemic first emerged. Equities rallied …
content:
Chinas GDP showed the first contraction in decades as the coronavirus outbreak shut down large parts of its economy. The country also revised its death toll by 39 per cent, adding 1,290 fatalities in Wuhan, where the epidemic first emerged.
